features: ❥ FUN IN BATH BATH: The bath toy for toddlers is waterfall station toy with rotating eyes, pipe outlet, rotary gear and rotating propeller functions. Fill, flow and spin. Kids can play game by themselves when taking a bath. And babies could distinguish colors with the colorful & lovely baby bath toy. Kids always prefer to choose the brightly colored bathtub toys!

❥ DEVELOP HAND-EYE COORDINATION: The Bath Toy is also a excellent learning gift for kids, to help in the development of mental and coordination abilities of kids. Children can learn simple knowledge of mechanical movement through filling the bathtub toys with two cups to rotate the toy eyes, starfish gear, propeller and creating waterfall, through playing the toddler bath toys, they can develop hand-eye coordination, motor skills and shape recognition.

❥ SAFE, NO BATTERIES & SMOOTH EDGES: The bath toy is made of durable plastic material and BPA free bath toys, environmental protection, safe and entertaining bathtub toy for 1 2 3 4 year old boys and girls. The edges of bathtub toy are smooth and well finished. No batteries are required for this bath toy. Then you don't need to worry about child getting hurt.

❥ STRONG SUCTION CUPS: The Bathtub Toy has two strong suction cups at backside, just attach the suction cups on the tub or smooth wall in bathroom. And you can change to any places and re-attach it anytime.Tips： please press the surface of suction cups on firmly untill all the air is gone. You could also attached it with the liquid soap, because it could help it attached securely.
❥ PERFECT SERVICE: We are always doing our best to satisfy our customers. If you have any problems, please feel free to let us know.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bath Toy Bathtub Toys - Fill and Spin Water Fountain Bath Toys with Two Cups - Toddler Bath Toys For 2 3 4 Year Old Boys and Girls

The Monkey Bath Toy for kids 2 3 4 year old boys girls is a good companion when taking a bath. Kids can fill, flow and spin with the two cups by themselves when taking a bath. And babies could distinguish colors with the colorful & lovely baby bath toy. → Adorable bath toy with two cute different cups accessories, have an exquisite colorful appearance which can easily catch kids eyes and play more fun, arousing kids’ initiative, promoting the healthy development of children both physically and mentally. → Babies can pour water in the two cups to rotate the cartoon eyes, create waterfall, drive rotary gear and rotate propeller. The bathtub toy not only brings babies funny bathtime but also develops babies' hand-eye coordination, motor skills and shape recognition. Kids always prefer to choose the brightly colored bathtub toys!

New Powerful Materials of Suction Cups The Bath Wall Toy has two super strong suction cups at backside, suitable for the bathtub, glass or smooth wall in bathroom.According to many customers' feedback, we improve the sucker materials which can attach longly and stably. Tips： please press the surface of suction cups on firmly untill all the air is gone. You could also attached it with the liquid soap, because it could help it attached securely. Safe & Easy Clean Water Bath Toy The Bath tub Toy is made of durable plastic materials BPA free and .The edges of the bath toy are smooth and well-touch which won’t hurt children’s hands.No batteries are requried for this kind of flower bath toy. Then you don't have to worry about the babies getting hurt. Drying fast and keeping clean inside. An ideal birthday, Christmas gift for toddlers kids babies for 2 3 4 year old boys and girls. Proper Size for Kids to Handle The height and length are both 8.27 in. Compact size can let kids play with easily and conveniently.The monkey colorful appearance is much easier to draw child's attention.Having a high-quality and durable bath toy can save much money and increase their feelings of happiness so simply. New accessories including two cups, one with holes below and one doesn’t, improve baby's hand-eye coordination and encourages imaginative play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything is good about this product. The suction cu[s are strong if you put it in flat surface. Not ideal for baby bathtub since it will it the curve and the suction will come loose. But works great for fun shower for my kid. He loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I feel a little guilty writing a positive review because it's most likely a knockoff (a company that translates text on the packaging so poorly is not a company that designs such a quality toy).But it is a great toy. Clever design. It does several little things, each fun for the toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves this bath toy, especially when the water runs through the monkey and his eyes go round. He finds it quite amusing and tries to grab the eyes. He asked for us to do it over and over again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but great toy!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality but It’s fairly small, perfect for a young toddler or a small tub but next time I would personally buy something of a larger scale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Kids love it, suction holding up for few weeks meanwhile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tub Toys is a Novel Idea!!!
reviews.reviewText: Getting my toddler to graduate from the baby tub into the adult tub was a challenge. So getting water toys that can be place in the tub would make my job easier as well as the transition for him. Well it certainly worked. Thank God! And thanks to this bath toys for kids. If you need help to make the transition smooth or even to make bath time fun, this is definitely the toy to get. The only downside is the one I got doesn't function properly. One of the suction cups keep sliding down no matter how much I've moved it around. I don't think it's all of them. Just the one I happen to have gotten. I would still buy it again though. Thank you Water Toys for Kids!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPER CUTE & WORKS GREAT
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old grandson loves playing with this in the bath. Works really well and so adorable to watch the monkey's eyes go around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter-in-law wanted new toys for my granddaughter that would be less prone to mold or mildew like some of the other bath toys she had that got water in them and couldn't dry out properly and got mold build up inside. This toy is mice because it mounts to the tub wall, has proper drainage and nothing to trap in water. The colors are bright and my granddaughter likes the interactive toy and has fun with it. I recommend this bath toy. I had to buy one for our house now for her to play with the next time I've got her overnight again. She'll be happy. Once she outgrows it, my grandson that arrives in May will be able to play with it when he's old enough. It's a solid toy, also. Nothing has fallen off of the one at their house yet and my 2 year old granddaughter tests her toys at times because that's what kids do. They said she lives it and that was my hope when I bought it before.
